name: Midnight Hopping
description:
SPACE = JUMP
Avoid ghosts and hop home!

You're a little frog who's gotten stranded a little far from your home late at night!
Your friend is waiting for you! Hop your way accross the spooky forest to find them and get back home! The ghosts come out at night, so be careful and avoid them!

Thank you to the following creators for the free assets used!
https://finn378.itch.io/platformer-toolkit-assets
https://lukaslundin.itch.io/froglet
https://master-blazter.itch.io/ghostspritepack
https://trixelized.itch.io/kinda-cute-forest
